member.name: T:UserManagement.PasswordPolicy
member.summary: A static class containig methods to set the password policy for user passwords.

member.name: M:UserManagement.PasswordPolicy.DefaultPolicyAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 6 characters.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the database.

member.name: M:UserManagement.PasswordPolicy.LevelOneAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number and letter.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the database.

member.name: M:UserManagement.PasswordPolicy.LevelTwoAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, at least one upper and lower case letter.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the database.

member.name: M:UserManagement.PasswordPolicy.LevelThreeAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, one letter and one symbol.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the database.

member.name: M:UserManagement.PasswordPolicy.LevelFourAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, one symbol, at least one upper and lower case letter.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the database.

member.name: T:UserManagement.SetupTables
member.summary: A static class used to setup the tables of your database.

member.name: M:UserManagement.SetupTables.CreateTablesAsync(System.String)
member.summary: This method must be used to automatically create all the necessary tables for the database before any other method in the library can be used.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the database.

member.name: T:UserManagement.UserManager
member.summary: A static class containing all the methods that are used to manage users in the library.

The password of the user.
The password must be confirmed before it can be set.
The firstname of the user.
The lastname of the user.
